answers.answer: Eat only wheat bread not white, sweet potato not white, plenty of vegies like broccoli, chicken and fish. Try to eat pork and beef maybe once a week. Try this, I did and dropped 22 lbs. in 3 weeks. Hope this helps.

I lost a bit of weight when I was on it too, but i just personally find my life easier with the insulin pens! In saying that, it is much better to use the pump for type 1 diabetics! (its just not for everybodies lifestyle) :)
